title: Travel documents for refugees and asylees
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, nationality, refugee/asylee status, document number, validity period
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Travel document status (valid/expired). Link to USCIS system (border control and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake refugee travel documents. Domain binding verifies USCIS. I-571/I-327 verification. International travel authorization. Re-entry to USA documentation. Asylum/refugee status proof. Uses SHA-512 (government ID privacy).
